description.en: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.ar: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.br: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.cns: 1小时内经验值增加50% (x1.5)。该物品可以叠加3次，最高可达2.5倍经验倍率。无法与普通经验加成卷轴同时使用，达到使用最高等级后会被自动移除。
description.de: Erhöht den Exp-Gewinn um 50% (x1,5) für 1h. Dieser Gegenstand kann 3 Mal gestapelt werden für insgesamt x2,5 Exp. Kann nicht gleichzeitig mit einer Basis-Scroll of Experience ES verwendet werden. Der Buff wird entfernt, sobald die maximale Stufe erreicht ist, um ihn zu verwenden.
description.fi: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.fil: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.fr: Expérience augmentée de 50% (x1,5) pendant 1 heure, cumulable 3 fois pour un total de x2,5. Ne peux pas être utilisé en même temps qu'un autre Parchemin d'Amplification ES. Le bonus d'expérience disparaîtra si vous atteignez le niveau maximum du parchemin.
description.id: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.it: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.jp: 1時間の間、獲得経験値が50%（1.5倍）に上昇します。このアイテムは3個まで重複使用でき、最大で2.5倍まで上昇します。戦神の巻物と同時使用はできません。バフは最大レベルに達すると解除されます。
description.kr: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.

description.ru: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
description.sp: Aumenta la Exp. ganada un 50% (x1.5) por 1h. Este objeto se puede acumular 3 veces con un total de x2.5 Exp. No se puede utilizar simultaneamente con un Pergamino Amplificador Básico ES. El beneficio se elimina una vez que se alcanza el nivel máximo para usarlo.

description.tw: 經驗增益增加 50% (x1.5)，持續 1 小時。 此物品可堆疊 3 次，總計 x2.5 經驗值。 不能與基礎經驗值增幅卷軸同時使用。 一旦達到使用的最高等級，該增益就會被移除。
description.vi: Increases Exp gain by 50% (x1.5) for 1h. This item can be stacked 3 times for a total of x2.5 Exp. Cannot be used at the same time as a basic Scroll of Amplification ES. The buff is removed once reaching the maximum level to use it.
